Error during scraping¶

The error is actually introduced by the resetter in conf.py. It mocks a “zero-size reduction” error in fig.savefig.

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
fig = plt.figure()

Total running time of the script: ( 0 minutes 0.000 seconds)

Download Python source code: plot_scraper_broken.py

Download Jupyter notebook: plot_scraper_broken.ipynb
